Review titled amazingly tasty cocktails with only 3 stars isn't a mistake.

The Black Mambo and Santeria cocktails were, quite simply, stunning. The presentation was great and the tastes were out of this world.

Why 3* and not 5*?

Lack lustre slow service and a...lazy menu.

If Galle Face is going to impose a mandatory 10% service charge then the service needs to meet both the 4* standard of a hotel and ensure the charge is value.

Problem is with service charges is that staff become accustomed to not having to work for the tip and service standards actually decrease.

This we found to be the case at not just this bar but the Travellers Bar, the Fire Beach and the Verandah.

Whilst they do clearly advise there are excluded taxes and service charges in this bar they do not highlight in percentage terms how much. You'll need to add 30% overall to the printed pricing in their menus.

Everywhere else in Sri Lanka managed to show tax inclusive prices, so you could easily work out if something was  value or not. At menu prices the cocktails were good value add on min  30% for tax and service charges and they were very low value especially in comparison to other  lazy menu.

The hummus and pita were alright the nasi goreng was okay too. 
Just disappointing that isso charges such premium prices when it's totally not worth it!!

The location is good and staff looks friendly as well.
